mapper.update: update orders_details set ctn=#{ctn} and volume=#{volume} and weight=#{weight} where order_id=(select id from orders where numbers=#{number})
mapper.select: select status from orders where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update orders set status =1 ,driver_id=#{driver_id},car_id=#{car_id} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select o.id,o.numbers,f.ctn,f.volume,f.weight,o.status,f.beizhu,d.name,c.car_number,a.address,o.picking,o.songhuo,q.phone from fba.orders as o,fba.subscriber_address as a,fba.driver_info as d,fba.car_info as c,fba.ship_schdule as s,fba.orders_details as f,subscriber_address as q where o.address_id=a.id and o.status=1 and s.user_id=#{user_id} and o.driver_id=d.id and c.id=o.car_id and s.id=o.item_id and o.address_id=q.id and f.order_id=o.id order by o.id

select o.id,o.numbers,f.ctn,f.volume,f.weight,f.beizhu,o.status,a.address,c.car_number,d.name,o.picking,o.songhuo from orders as o,subscriber_address as a,car_info as c,driver_info as d,fba.ship_schdule as s,fba.orders_details as f where o.address_id=a.id and o.numbers=#{numbers} and s.user_id=#{user_id} and s.id=o.item_id and (o.status=0 or o.status=1 or o.status=2) and f.order_id=o.id

select o.id from fba.orders as o,fba.orders_details as f,fba.ship_schdule as s,fba.subscriber_address as a where o.status=0 and s.id=o.item_id and s.user_id=#{user_id} and f.order_id=o.id and o.address_id=a.id

select o.id from fba.orders as o,fba.ship_schdule as s,fba.orders_details as f,fba.driver_info as d,fba.car_info as c where s.id=o.item_id and s.user_id=#{user_id} and f.order_id=o.id and d.id=o.driver_id and c.id=o.car_id order by o.id
select o.address_id,o.id,o.status,o.numbers,d.ups from fba.orders as o,fba.orders_details as d,fba.ship_schdule as s where o.item_id =s.id and s.number=#{number} and d.order_id=o.id group by id
select * from orders where user_id=#{user_id} and status=1
select d.chaigui,d.category from orders as o,orders_details as d where o.id=#{id} and o.id=d.order_id
